casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Buddy Lee LOCKLEAR. No. 504A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 14, 2004. Duncan B. McCormick, for Locklear. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of April 2004 by Attorney General For Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of April 2004."
